name: Low Profile
description: Yours small stature helps you avoid ranged attacks.
benefit: You gain a +1 dodge bonus to AC against ranged attacks. In addition, you do not provide soft cover to creatures when ranged attacks pass through your square.
staminaText: When targeted by a ranged attack, you can spend a number of stamina points up to your Dexterity bonus. For each stamina point you spend in this way, your dodge bonus to AC against that attack increases by 1.
description_zh: 你的较小身躯能够帮助自身免受远程攻击。
benefit_zh: 在对抗远程攻击时，你的AC获得+1闪避加值。此外，当远程攻击通过你的方格时，你不会给其他生物提供软掩蔽。
